movie_title: Astronauts home after 9 months in space: BBC Learning English from the News
introduction: After a 9 month delay, Nasa astronauts return to Earth üîé For a free worksheet, and all the vocabula

vocabulary.definition: left somewhere with no way of leaving, needing outside help or assistance
vocabulary.example: The shipwrecked sailors were stranded on the deserted island.

vocabulary.definition: to land in water, especially describing a spacecraft returning to Earth
vocabulary.example: The capsule splashed down smoothly in the ocean after re-entry.

vocabulary.definition: to be worried or disturbed by something
vocabulary.example: Despite the challenges, she remained unfazed and continued her mission.
The athletes endured a grueling training session in preparation for the marathon.

vocabulary.definition: a combination of a verb and one or more particles (preposition or adverb) that functions as a single unit
vocabulary.example: Learning phrasal verbs can help improve your English fluency.

vocabulary.definition: to give special importance or prominence to something
vocabulary.example: The teacher emphasized the need for thorough preparation before the exam.
